text:
is a Japanese female athlete. She is best known as an association football player.
Early life.
Asano Nagasato was born in Atsugi, Kanagawa. She is the sister of footballers Genki Nagasato and Yūki Nagasato.
International competitions.
Nagasato was on the women's team which played in the 2008 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup. Her play was highlighted when she scored against the German team.
In 2012, she is a member of the Japan women's national football team. She took part in the process of qualifying for the 2012 Summer Olympics, but she did not compete in London.
